title: Windows Server 2012 Pocket Consultant
description:
Book Description

Portable and precise, this pocket-sized guide delivers ready answers for the day-to-day administration of Windows Server 2012. Zero in on core operations and daily tasks using quick-reference tables, instructions, and lists. Get fast facts on these essential topics:

Automating administrative tasks and policies
